abstract: Aleksandr Tkachev, governor of the Krasnodar region in Russia, which will host the 2014 Winter Olympics, says he has enlisted the area's Cossacks as an auxiliary police force to prevent darker-skinned Muslims from moving there; statement touches upon hot-button national issue of internal migration within Russian society.
lead_paragraph: Aleksandr Tkachev, the governor of the Krasnodar region, which will host the Winter Olympics in 2014, said the Cossacks would be an auxiliary police force to prevent darker-skinned Muslims from moving there.

headline.seo: Russian to Use Cossacks Against North Caucasus Migrants
headline.main: Russian Governor Signs Up Cossacks to Police Migrants
